description.ko: 네온빛으로 젖어든 폭우의 선명한 반사 속에 포착된 미래 도시의 외로운 메아리.
description.en: The lonely echo of a futuristic city captured in the vibrant reflections of a neon-soaked downpour.

prompt: A low-angle view of a claustrophobic, rainy cyberpunk alleyway filled with dense vertical neon signage. Puddles on the asphalt reflect vibrant pink and cyan lights with hyper-realistic fluid dynamics. Textures include rusted metal, wet pavement, and glowing holographic ads. Rendered in 8k, Octane Render, featuring cinematic volumetric fog and global illumination. Light spills from high-density urban structures, creating dramatic shadows and a digital romance atmosphere with sharp focus on individual rain droplets falling through neon beams.
